<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/cc836556d962058d8b8fbc45c400b7e9d643976a|patch 8.2.0891: clang warns for invalid conversion>
patch 8.2.0891: clang warns for invalid conversion

Problem:    Clang warns for invalid conversion.
Solution:   Use zero instead of INVALCOLOR.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0891: clang warns for invalid conversion · vim/vim@cc83655
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0891: clang warns for invalid conversion · vim/vim@cc83655
attachments.text: Problem: Clang warns for invalid conversion. Solution: Use zero instead of INVALCOLOR.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3ac498c8a1c3570c296093a5d9425b2a3a7cdb29|patch 8.2.0885: "make shadow" does not link new lua test dir>
patch 8.2.0885: "make shadow" does not link new lua test dir

Problem:    "make shadow" does not link new lua test dir.
Solution:   Also link testdir/testluaplugin. (Elimar Riesebieter)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0885: "make shadow" does not link new lua test dir · vim/vim@3ac498c

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c17e66c5c0acd5038f1eb3d7b3049b64bb6ea30b|patch 8.2.0886: cannot use octal numbers in scriptversion 4>
patch 8.2.0886: cannot use octal numbers in scriptversion 4

Problem:    Cannot use octal numbers in scriptversion 4.
Solution:   Add the "0o" notation. (Ken Takata, closes #5304)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0886: cannot use octal numbers in scriptversion 4 · vim/vim@c17e66c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0886: cannot use octal numbers in scriptversion 4 · vim/vim@c17e66c
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot use octal numbers in scriptversion 4. Solution: Add the "0o" notation. (Ken Takata, closes #5304)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/57f75a5a364ad4d8334fdf6b6b41420b48e08390|patch 8.2.0887: searchcount().exact_match is 1 right after a match>
patch 8.2.0887: searchcount().exact_match is 1 right after a match

Problem:    Searchcount().exact_match is 1 right after a match.
Solution:   Use LT_POS() instead of LTOREQ_POS(). (closes #6189)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0887: searchcount().exact_match is 1 right after a match · vim/vim@57f75a5
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0887: searchcount().exact_match is 1 right after a match · vim/vim@57f75a5
attachments.text: Problem: Searchcount().exact_match is 1 right after a match. Solution: Use LT_POS() instead of LTOREQ_POS(). (closes #6189)

patch 8.2.0888: readdirex() returns size -2 for a directory

Solution:   Add missing "else". (Ken Takata, closes #6185)

patch 8.2.0889: using old style comments

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1e5f8f6d65b2ecff3d93d9fdbdd17c7a2ab9cc3d|patch 8.2.0890: no color in terminal window when 'termguicolor' is set>
patch 8.2.0890: no color in terminal window when 'termguicolor' is set

Problem:    No color in terminal window when 'termguicolor' is set.
Solution:   Clear the underline color. (closes #6186)
